duties_responsibilities.duty: Engage and connect with guests to provide a world-class customer experience, offering top-quality product education and showcasing authentic community and culture.
Assess guests' needs, provide effective purchase and return solutions, conduct accurate guest transactions, and receive guest feedback to improve the experience.
Contribute to a respectful and inclusive team environment, establish supportive relationships with team members, and collaborate to optimize the guest experience.
Perform product presentation and cleaning tasks to maintain the luxury environment of the store, using in-store technology to support operations and guest experiences.

education_certification.credential: High school diploma, GED, or equivalent
